title: Redesigning Web-Based Patient Assessment Competency Enhancement Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Medical Terminology and Fundamental Patient Interaction Knowledge
context.additional_context: A blended learning environment combining in-person instruction with online activities. Emphasis on self-directed learning and peer assessment using web-based tools and collaborative platforms

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 85% accuracy in patient symptom judgment through web-based self-assessment
Through peer collaboration worksheet activities, learners understand the patient medical history analysis process at over 90% proficiency

Learners can submit structured patient records with over 80% accuracy in each section (subjective information, objective information, assessment, plan) based on three virtual patient cases in a SOAP note writing assignment.
Formative assessments identify learning gaps and facilitate the development of corrective learning plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
